name: Htreom and the Thermodynamic Reactor
description:
Playing on full screen is highly recommended!

A submission for Rendang Game Jam 2020 (1).

Htreom, the robot needs to stop the Reactor from overheating (or "over-chilling")! Use the power of thermal conduction to stop that from happening.

Developer's Note

To be honest, I'm not very satisfied with this concept. Although it can serve as a interesting edutainment concept, I think it is quite difficult to communicate the various concepts of thermodynamics like heat capacity, thermal conductivity, blackbody radiation, convection, etc, through pure gameplay.

Eh, whatever, not all prototypes can be promising. Of course, this game is quite bad, but that is par for the course for a rushed game jam entry made from scratch (total dev time is about 19 hours, that is crazy short!).

The submission is fairly early because of real life happenings, and I can't dedicate a Monday morning to this game jam. I don't know why I did this game jam, even though I promised myself not to rush into one with a blank Unity project, lol.
